channel.title: Graphics Shop
channel.description:
My prices:
10m for everything.
Bear in mind, that for 10m i will be treating it will be a sample of my best possible work!!!
I'll also be posting all the work i make, so you can see what it could look like.
To contact me you must do the following: - Post on this thread - Skype me: xiitrauma - and add my runescape: Axel S
once i've made you a graphic, i will show you a preview over skype screen share, and after a 10m transaction, i'll send it to you over skype.
When you order,
give me as much details on how you want it to look, link me examples if you want, name fonts, colours, sizes (a must)
as much as you can think of!!
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j324/xiitrauma/mysig_zpsa7a79436.png[/img]
My work:
[img]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j324/xiitrauma/projectfrost_zps7d7552db.jpg[/img]
